maqras.text: sillo geuleul ttaleuneun mulijung-e abeulaham-i iss-eossnola
geuga gyeong-geonha ma-eum-eulo ju kkelo wass-eul ttae
abeojiwa geuui baegseong-ege yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-i mueos-inyo
yeoleobun-i sungbaehaneun geugeos-eun hananim-i anin heowiui usang-i a nideonyo
man-yuui junim-e gwanhayeo yeoleo bun-eun eotteohge saenglahaneunyo
geuleon hu geuneun byeoldeul-eul chyeoda bogoseo
malhagil sillo nae ma-eum-i apeudoda
geuleoja salamdeul-i deung-eul dolli go tteonassdeola
geuhu geuga geudeul-ui sin-ege da gaga neohuineun neohui ap-e malyeondoen eum sig-eul meogji moshaneunyo
mal-eul haji anhneunde eotteon il-i iss-eossneunyo
geuleon hu geuneun dagaga oleun son-eulo geugeos-eul busuwo beolyeossdeola
geuhu usang sungbaejadeul-i geubhi seodulleo dallyeowa geuleul daehani
geuga malhagil yeoleobun-i mandeun usang-eul sungbaehandan mal-inyo
hananimkkeseo yeoleobun-eul changjohasyeossgo yeoleobun-i mandeun geosdo geuleoha dago hani
geudeul-i malhagil hwadeog-eul mandeul-eotaoleuneun bulsog-eulo geuleul deonjila
igeos-i silpaehani geudeul-eun da leun eummoleul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geu deul-eul gajang bicheonhan jadeullo mandeul-eoss nola
geuga malhagil naui junimkkelo galini geubunkkeseo naleul indohayeo jusil geos-ila
juyeo jeoege sunjonghal jason-euljuobsoseo
geulihayeo hananim-eun innaeha myeo sunjonghal aiga iss-eul bog-eum-ui so sig-eul geuege jueossnola

adeul-ui naiga geuwa hamkke ilhal naie ileuleoss-eul ttae geuga malhagil nae adeul-a neoleul jedan-e eul lilaneun myeonglyeong-eul naega kkum-eseo boass nola neoui saeng-gag-i eotteonji algo sip guna lago hani adeul-i malhagil a beoji dangsinkkeseo myeonglyeongbad-eun daelo ha obsoseo hananimkkeseo innaehaneun jong-eu lobuteo wonhasindamyeon dangsinkkeseo jeoleul balgyeonhal geos-ibnida hayeossdeola
geu dul-iseo hananimkke sunjonghago geuneun geulo hayeogeum geuui ima leul sug-idolog haess-eul ttae
hananim-eun geuleul bulleo abeulaham-a
geudaeneun imi geu kkum-eul ihaeng hayeossnola hananim-eun ileohdeus seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul naelinila
sillo igeos-eun bunmyeonghan hanauisiheom-ieossnani
hananim-eun hullyunghan huisaeng-eulo geuleul daesinhayeossnola
hananim-eun geuege cheugbog-eul naelyeo hue ol sedaedeul-ui gieogsog-e nam ge haessnola
abeulaham-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul haenghaneun geudeul-ege bosang-eul naelinila
geuneun mid-eum-i ganghan hananim-uijongdeul jung-e iss-eossnola
hananim-eun geuege uiloun jajeung-e iss-eul han yeeonja isag-ui so sig-eul jueo
geuwa geuligo isag-ege chugbog-eul naelyeoss-euna geudeul-ui huson jung-ui mu lineun uiloum-eul haenghayeoss-eudoe daleun mulineun saaghan haeng-wileul haess-eossnola
dasi hananim-eun mosewa alon-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eossnola
hananim-eun geudeulgwa geudeul-ui baeg
geudeul-eul dowass-eumae geudeul-eun geujaeang-eul geugboghayeossgo
geudeul-ege sasil-eul balghyeo juneunseongseoleul jueoss-eumyeo
geudeul-eul olh-eun gillo indohan hu
geudeul-ege chugbog-eul naelyeo hue-ol sedaedeul-ui gieog sog-e namge hayeoss nola
mosewa alon-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
hananim-eun geuwa gat-i hayeo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-ege bosang-eul nae linola
sillo geudeul-eun mid-eum-i ganghan uli hananim-ui jongdeul jeung du jong-ieoss nola
elliyaseudo hananim-i bo naen seonjija jung han seonjijalo
geuga geuui baegseongdeul-ege neohuineun hananim-eul dulyeowo haji anhneunyo
ba-eullaleul sungbaehago gajang hullyunghan changjojuleul beolineunyo
hananim-eun neohui junim-isa jinagan seonjodeul-ui junim-i anideonyo lago malhayeoss-euna
geudeul-eun geuege geoyeoghayeoss-eu ni geudeul-eun bunmyeong bulliwo gass-eulila
geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-eun geuleohji anihaessnola
hananim-eun geuege chugbog-eul naelyeo hue ol sedaedeul-ui gieogsog-e nam ge hayeossnola
illiyaseuwa gat-eun ideul-ege pyeong-an-i iss-eul geos-ila
ileohdeus hananim-eun seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul bepunila
sillo geuneun mid-eum-i ganghan ha nanim-ui jong jung-ui han jong-ieossnola
losdo hananim-i bonaen seonji ja jung han seonjijalo
hananim-eun geuwa geuligo geuuichujongja moduleul guhayeossnola
geuleona dwie nam-eun han neulg-eun yeoseong-eun je-oedoeeossnola
geuhu hananim-eun nameojido myeolmangke haessnani
sillo neohuiga achim-i doemae geudeul-ui sajeogjileul jinagassnola
jeonyeog-edo geuleohageoneul neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
yonado hananim-i bonaen seon jija jung han seonjijalo
geuneun han noyecheoleom gadeug sil-eun baelo dojuhayeo
jeomsul-eul deonjyeoss-euni geuga binan-eul bad-assdeola
geuttae keun gogiga geuleul samkyeo beolyeoss-euni ineun geuui binanbad-eul haeng wi ttaemun-ieossnola
hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago geuga hoegaehaji anihaessdamyeon
geuneun bunmyeong geu mulgogi baes-sog e buhwal-ui geunalkkaji iss-eoss-eulila
